subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: No team gathers momentum the way the North Carolina Tar Heels do. No team perhaps squanders it the way they do, either, always with youthful exuberance and highlight-reel flair.
snippet: No team gathers momentum the way the North Carolina Tar Heels do. No team perhaps squanders it the way they do, either, always with youthful exuberance and highlight-reel flair.
